WRITING.TEXT: Oh right, I forget that there is a drinking age sometimes. Eh, once you pass 21 instead of being like "let's lower the drinking age so all these younger people can drink!" you're like "oh screw it, I had to wait that long to for it to be legal"
Yup, thank you random internet stranger :) If you're in the southwestern US ish area, I'll grab a beer with you! Highly unlikely you're in my area though haha.
